newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan to auction federal investment bonds.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan to auction federal investment bonds.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan said on Sunday it had invited bids up to Tuesday for the auction of three-year, five-year and 10-year maturity federal investment bonds.
The result of the auction would be announced on Wednesday with settlement set for Thursday, the bank said. It set no pre-auction target.

In the previous auction on July 11, the bank accepted bids worth 300 million rupees at par for three-year maturity bonds, 44.5 million rupees at par for five-year bonds and 782.588 million rupees at par for the 10-year maturity bonds.
